name: Teeny Tiny Space Game (logankoester)
description:
A variation on https://guitsaru.itch.io/teeny-tiny-space-game with a few experimental ideas/improvements:

  • Enhanced / additional sprite assets and artwork
  • Acceleration and drag on player movement
  • Calculate health/damage on each collision until the entity is destroyed
  • Adds neutral satellite objects (disc, station, meteor) acting as destructable shields
  • Adds endgame boss that drops bombs rather than firing lasers
  • Various speed/timing adjustments for fluid/natural feeling gameplay
